ai-kv19.1:1.1_0: He gives up the defilements in the past,
ai-kv19.1:1.3_0: it thoroughly go beyond, discovered, and brokens its poison, produced, and gone beyond, it leads to the ending of all.
ai-kv19.1:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:1.5_0: He gives up the defilements in the past,
ai-kv19.1:1.7_0: In the past I did not swept the past,
ai-kv19.1:1.9_0: And you should surely be told, Revata,
ai-kv19.1:1.10_0: It gives callous food to wear.
ai-kv19.1:1.11_0: He gives up the defilements in the past,
ai-kv19.1:1.15_0: nor is one who says in the past,
ai-kv19.1:1.16_0: It gives callous food to wear.
ai-kv19.1:2.1_0: In the future, if it does become tired,
ai-kv19.1:2.3_0: She is reborn in a unborn, unborn, unproduced, unborn, unproduced, without rebirth, old age, and death.
ai-kv19.1:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:2.5_0: In the future, if it does become tired,
ai-kv19.1:2.9_0: and had come to us who do not say,
ai-kv19.1:2.11_0: In the future, if it does become tired,
ai-kv19.1:2.13_0: Hasn’t you come back to the future?
ai-kv19.1:2.15_0: If you’re being joyful, you can’t be told,
ai-kv19.1:3.1_0: he abandons the defilements in the present.
ai-kv19.1:3.3_0: Their greed gives up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv19.1:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:3.5_0: They give up greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-kv19.1:3.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:4.1_0: The path associated with greed is the mind associated with the mind.
ai-kv19.1:4.3_0: is included by two kinds of mind:
ai-kv19.1:4.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:5.1_0: Greed is the path, skilled in goodness,
ai-kv19.1:5.3_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv19.1:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:6.1_0: Skillful qualities are profitable and unprofitable; inferior and superior states on the side of darkness and on the side of bright.
ai-kv19.1:6.4_0: “Mendicants, these four things are very far apart.
ai-kv19.1:6.7_0: This is the first thing that is easy to teach for someone who is easy to teach and the Dhamma. That’s why it is for one who is assured.”
ai-kv19.1:7.2_0: “They burn after being exhausted, and they get tired in the future.”
ai-kv19.1:7.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv19.1:7.6_0: for they burn the future in the past, future times, and present.
ai-kv19.1:7.7_0: The account of the corruptions of the defilements is finished.
